title: Introducing: Oupa
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/oupa2.jpg "oupa2")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5793-introducing-oupa/attachment/oupa2)

**Yuck’s** sound is as distinctive as the decade it seeks to re-imagine. So when a 4-track cassette was released last year that was largely piano based, **Yuck** fans were pretty darn baffled. It turns out it was the side project of lead singer **Daniel Blumberg**.

The tracks are absorbing, deeply personal and fragile in their very sensibility. After returning from his show with **Porcelain Raft** only a few hours ago, I can confirm he’s just as moving live. Tears were shed (mostly by me). Check out his latest track bellow!

[Check For Live Shows!](http://oupamusic.com/)

[Listen to more over at Oupa’s SoundCloud](http://soundcloud.com/oupamusic/)

 [Forget](http://soundcloud.com/oupamusic/forget) by [oupa](http://soundcloud.com/oupamusic)

It turns out it was the side project of lead singer Daniel Blumberg. The tracks are absorbing, deeply personal and fragile in their \[…\]
excerpt.short: Yuck’s sound is as distinctive as the decade it seeks to re-imagine.
